resources.string: Automatically turn off bot when runtime error (Recommended)
Backup database when DataBase.removeDataBase is called
Some settings will be applied at next compile
Please wait for a moment to load ad…

(English Help is outdated. It would be updated later) 
Make your own Kakaotalk Bot!
 Before you start, you should know how to code in JavaScript
 You can reply the room by calling replier.reply(String) in response function

 Api.getContext() : get this application's context
 Api.reload() or Api.compile() : re-compile all the script
 Api.reload("Script.js") or Api.compile("Script.js") : re-compile the script
 Api.prepare("Script.js") : compile only if the script has never been compiled. throws error on compile failure, returns 0 when the script doesn't exists, returns 1 on compile success, and returns 2 if the script has ever been compiled.
 Api.off() : turn off your bot
 Api.replyRoom(room,message,hideToast=false) : send message to specific room
 Api.canReply(room) : check if bot can reply to room
 Utils.getWebText(url:String) : get website's HTML
 Utils.parse(url:String) : return html parse data as Jsoup Document

 Log.error(string,viewToast=false) : add error log to log screen (if viewToast is true, it makes Toast popup)
 Log.info(string) : add info to log screen
 Log.debug(string) : add debug log to log screen

 AppData.putInt/Boolean/String(String key,int/boolean/String data) : save data to appdata
 AppData.getInt/Boolean/String() : load data from appdata
 AppData.clear() : clear the appdata
 AppData.remove(String key) : remove data from appdata

 DataBase.setDataBase(String fileName,String content) : overwrite data to file
 DataBase.getDataBase(String fileName) : get data from file
 DataBase.removeDataBase(String fileName) : delete file
 DataBase.appendDataBase(String fileName,String content) : append data to file

 Bridge.getScopeOf(String scriptName) : Gets the script's scope.
 Bridge.isAllowed(String scriptName) : returns if the script is allowed to be accessed
 Device : contains device information.
 .getBuild()
 .getAndroidVersionCode()
 .getAndroidVersionName()
 .getPhoneBrand()
 .getPhoneModel()
 .isCharging()
 .getPlugType()
 .getBatteryLevel()
 .getBatteryHealth()
 .getBatteryTemperature()
 .getBatteryVoltage()
 .getBatteryStatus()
 .getBatteryIntent()

FileStream : Provides file read/write.
 .read(path): read file
 .write(path,content): write file
 
 
 Rhino, Mozilla's JavaScript Engine, is used in this application.
 License: https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0
Long press to open in another app
Long press to Save and Compile
To go to settings, tap OK button
Allow Bridge to access this script\'s scope
Automatically compile scripts when you get first message but no script was compiled
Package names to read Notification (Separate with lines)
An Internal Error has occurred. Please send log screen image to burningpig9592@gmail.com.
Since this script doesn\'t include response function, so turning on this is redundant.
Use unified parameters. Not recommended for beginners of JavaScript
Please type the name of this script.
